com.soa.policy.wspolicy.PolicyMarshaller

    • Uses of PolicyMarshaller in com.soa.console.policy.renderer

      Methods in com.soa.console.policy.renderer that return PolicyMarshaller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PolicyMarshaller PolicyConfigurationContext.getPolicyMarshaller()
      Returns a PolicyMarshaller that can be used to convert an XML model of a policy to its Java representation.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PolicyMarshaller EffectivePolicyFactory.getMarshaller()
      Returns the marshaller used to generate the effective policies.
      Methods in com.soa.policy.wspolicy with parameters of type PolicyMarshaller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ReferencedPolicyFactory.addReferencedPolicy(org.w3c.dom.Element referencedPolicy, PolicyMarshaller marshaller)
      Indexes a policy element via its wsu:Id attribute so that clients may later request this policy by URI reference.
      void EffectivePolicyFactory.setMarshaller(PolicyMarshaller marshaller)
      Changes the marshaller used to generate the effective policies.
      void SubPolicyAssertionMarshaller.setPolicyMarshaller(PolicyMarshaller policyMarshaller)
      Configures a policy marshaller to be used for marshaling the sub-policy assertions.
